issue.title: RSS Feed: display name instead of ID
issue.body:
**Original author :** Baud Rémy

It would be nice to display the job name instead of the job ID in the job rss feed.

Example:
Alertes Monitor pour le job n°4

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

This is an old and very specific ticket & the community plans to make a large MONITOR refactoring.

Therefore, this ticket is rejected.
